name: ABS vs THE BLOOD QUEEN
description:
Killer Queen took the arcade world by storm.
Killer Queen Black brought the battle home.
And now... ABS vs. THE BLOOD QUEEN heralds the first single-player Killer Queen adventure!

Built directly on top of the Killer Queen engine, ABS vs. THE BLOOD QUEEN takes the skills and techniques found in Killer Queen and applies them to an entirely new experience, full of never-before-seen enemies, power-ups, and challenges. As the titular hero, Abs, you'll run, fly, and slay your way through an undead horde as you head towards a fated showdown with the terrifying, all-powerful Blood Queen!

    EXPLORATION - Make your way through brand-new, randomly generated worlds that will keep each playthrough feeling unique and challenging!

    ARCADE-STYLE SCORING - Prove your might with Daily Challenges, and earn some sorely-needed bragging rights with Global Leaderboards!

    BATTLE-TESTED GAMEPLAY - Using the Killer Queen engine, ABS vs. THE BLOOD QUEEN will feel familar to Killer Queen veterans while staying accessible to newcomers.

    KEEP YOUR SKILLS SHARP - Run berries, ride the snail, and warrior up while discovering all-new powerups to take down your new enemies!

A LITTLE BACKSTORY ON BUMBLEBEAR AND ABS VS THE BLOOD QUEEN


Over the years, we at BumbleBear Games have striven to be the vanguards of the modern arcade. We've put over 150 Killer Queen machines into arcades, bars, and rec rooms across the country, with millions of games played. Our games are all about physically bringing people together, face to face—which at the present moment, is obviously not possible.

When COVID-19 started sweeping across the globe, the arcade scene was (and continues to be) heavily impacted by the closing of bars/arcades and the implementation of social distancing. This left both our company and the Killer Queen community in a rough spot, so we set out to create something unique that would help bring our players closer together while we all navigate the difficulties of quarantined life.

That's how we came up with ABS vs. THE BLOOD QUEEN, the fast-paced, high-flying, single-player 2D platformer based in the Killer Queen universe. We hope you enjoy our first single-player Killer Queen adventure!
